topic.title: Injury Incident Description Section - conformance rules

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.17"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="11374-6" Injury Incident Description Section (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10094)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title and SHOULD equal "Injury Incident Description Section"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] text

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entry

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entry
Contains exactly one [1..1] Height Of Fall (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.58)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entry
Contains exactly one [1..1] Disaster Type (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.59)
